name: Space Jones VR
description: Space Jones is a FPS VR game. Story: At an era of human space colony expansion, a bounty hunter (the player) accidently picked up a mysterious treasure named “Star Box”. Therefore, the bounty hunter has been targeted by multiple space pirates. A major war will be triggered at any time.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WIN7 Processor: I5 4570 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce gtx970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 920 MB available space Sound Card: 10.59
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WIN7 Processor: I7 4570 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce gtx970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 920 MB available space Sound Card: 10.59

reviews.review_text: I can eventually make my rocking chair useful. haha lovely experience, I might make a video about it.
